item_category: HUAWEI MediaPad T5 is a 10.1-inch tablet with a Kirin 659 octa-core processor that comes with an IPS screen with a resolution of 1920 x 1200 pixels. Supporting high-speed Internet connectivity, office work, GPS navigation, and other features, the T5 functions as a smart assistant and entertainment center. The T5 runs Huawei's latest EMUI 8.0 OS, which is developed based on Google Android Oreo.

If you are looking for a tablet around the £100-£150 price range I would recommend this tablet as it beats most of its competition at the price. It's not gonna be the best tablet out there but for a budget it's been class you won't find anything better unless you're willing to spend big money. Only problem that I have with it which isn't that big is the speakers are at the bottom of the device when in landscape but still sounds great for tunes.

I like the Huawei T5, it's a great size with it's 10" crystal clear screen. It's great for apps, web browsing and e-books. Brilliant picture quality for photos as well. 
The only downside is mine has frozen a few time when streaming videos, works ok in portrait mode but in full screen it freezes and the some of the apps crash.
Also the battery life isn't great, I seem to spend more time charging it than using it.
